title: Grithic River
text: The Grithic River in [[Khorvaire]] flows from the [[Byeshk Mountains]] into [[Crescent Bay]]. It forms part of the border between the [[Eldeen Reaches]] and the [[Shadow Marches]]. Due to the river's proximity to the [[Twilight Demesne]], aquatic [[fey]] known as [[naiad|nymph]]s can be found frolicking in this river.
